price: Báyẹn ni A ṣe fún Yūsuf ní ipò àti ibùgbé lórí ilẹ̀. Ó sì ń gbé ní ibi tí ó bá fẹ́. Àwa ń mú ìkẹ́ Wa bá ẹnikẹ́ni tí A bá fẹ́. A ò sì níí fi ẹ̀san àwọn olùṣe-rere ráre.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَكَّنَّا لِيُوسُفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ يَشَآءُۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحۡمَتِنَا مَن نَّشَآءُۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika makkannā liyūsufa fī al-arḍi yatabawwa-u min'hā ḥaythu yashāu nuṣību biraḥmatinā man nashāu walā nuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
